steps: Place three resistors and three 220 ohm resistors on th breadboard
Connect a jumper wire between the positive side and one side of the resistor of each LED
1.Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of the breadboard
2.Connect jumper wires from the negatie rail negative side of each LED
3.Connect a jumper wire from D4 to one side of R3
4.Connect a jumper wire from D5 to one side of R2
5.Connect a jumper wire from D6 to one side of R1
2.Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the third pin of the potentiometer
3.Connect a jumper wire from A0 to the middle pin of the potentiometer
4.Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to first pin of the potentiometer
5.Run the project and then go to the Play Section
